title: Use drawLine procedure to draw figure

content.question: Which of the following code segments can be used to draw the figure?

choices.label: xVal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 1yVal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 1REPEAT 5 TIMES{drawLine(xVal, yVal, xVal, yVal + len)xVal <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> xVal + 1len <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> len + 1}
